question: Can we wash NAPAKH (unpure) clothes in normal washing machine with other pak clothes.
answer:
QUESTION
Or will this make other clothes also napakh.
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to wash the impure clothes washed with other pure, but dirty clothes in domestic washing. The impure clothes will become pure.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
